titles: A murnival of knaves, or, Whiggism plainly display'd, and (if not grown shameless) burlesqu't out of countenance
author: Norris, John, 1657-1711.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Satire in verse on four prominent Whigs: Lord Shaftesbury, Titus Oates, Slingsby Bethel, & Sir Thomas Player.
keywords: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, --  Earl of, 1621-1683.
Political satire, English --  Early works to 1800.
